name: The Magic Ink: Adventure Drawing
description:
Magic Ink is an adventure drawing game with physics puzzles that makes you think outside the box. The goal is to protect your friends from traps and monsters. But don't think this will be an easy task! To complete each mission, you need to use your imagination, creativity and drawing skills.

How to play:

The game is very simple. You have four different magic inks at your disposal: Black, Blue, Yellow and Red. You need to draw shapes and combine colors to guide the characters to their destinations.

  1. Everything you draw with black ink is solid and static. You can use it to block enemies and create bridges and slopes to help your characters.
  2. Blue Ink floats in the air. Use this ink to overcome obstacles and make things fly.
  3. Red Ink is very similar to black ink, but is affected by gravity. You can use red paint to make boats, disable traps, and protect yourself.
  4. Yellow Ink can erase shapes and can show hidden secrets in each level.

To advance to next level, you need to help at least one character to reach its destination. However, to earn three stars is way harder! To do so, you will need to help all characters reach their final destination in a time limit. Don't be sad if you fail the first time, some puzzles are difficult...

Tips:

  1. Remember to read all messages. The game will teach everything you need to know.
  2. Use the checkpoints to save your progress.
  3. Pay attention to road signs.
  4. Use each magic ink properly.
  5. Combine inks and use your imagination.

Features:

  • Draw shapes to solve challenging physics puzzles.
  • Use your creativity and drawing skills to overcome obstacles.
  • Multiple ways to solve each level.
  • Gain presents to decorate your characters.
  • Everything you draw reacts with physics.
  • Hundreds of puzzles to solve.
  • Four graphic settings: low, normal, high and potato.
  • Four Magic Inks to play with.

We respect you as a user! Therefore, we do not collect, store or share any of your data. For more information, see our privacy policies: https://axntek.github.io/privacy_paid.html
